hasAttributes.name: PropertyLocationFunctionId
hasAttributes.description: The identifier of the Property Location Function.

hasAttributes.name: PropertyLocationFunctionName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the Property Location Function.

definitions.description:
A description of the function performed by the associated Property Location.

Ex:
- Retail Space
- Commercial Space
- Public
- Administrative
- Loading Dock
- Information Desk
